RDPDFLib.view

Class PDFViewHorz

  • RDPDFLib.view.PDFViewHorz

  • public class PDFViewHorz : PDFView
    inherited from PDFView class. Use horizontal mode to show PDF pages

    • Method Detail

      • vOpen

        public override void vOpen(
PDFDoc doc,
int page_gap,
uint back_color,
PDFViewListener listener
)
        Override vOpen method in PDFView open and render PDF document in horizontal mode
        Parameters:
        doc - A PDFDoc instance which refers to the PDF document
        page_gap - gap between pages
        back_color - background color
        listener - A implementation of PDFViewListener to deal with PDF reading and user interaction events, including view loaded, page changed, page single tapped, etc.
        Returns:

        Set display direction.

        rtol - Display from right to left. True if yes
